definition: to learn a skill or art
China Federation of Literary and Art Circles (CFLAC)/abbr. to 文聯|文联
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Wen2 xue2 Yi4 shu4 jie4 Lian2 he2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国文学艺术界联合会

sentences.english: He was apprenticed to a master silversmith.
sentences.chinese: 他跟银匠师傅拜师学艺。

sentences.english: Therefore actively served as high school three years.
sentences.chinese: 因此高中三年积极担任学艺。

sentences.english: Our school-wide academic contest will be held this Saturday, 12/11/04.
sentences.chinese: 本学期学艺竞赛将于本周六，十二月十一日举行。

sentences.english: In the history of Chinese literature, the period of symbolical thought of literary and artistic theory has not been recognized.
sentences.chinese: 在中国文学史上，象征型文学艺术观一直未被确认。

sentences.english: Such were the literature and art of the ruling class in China's feudal era.
sentences.chinese: 中国封建时代统治阶级的文学艺术，就是这种东西。

sentences.english: In order to learn the skills, he is not afraid of hard, full of art.
sentences.chinese: 为了学本领，他不怕艰苦，到处拜师学艺。

sentences.english: His father apprenticed him to a carpenter.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲使他向木匠拜师学艺。

sentences.english: When your father allowed you to pursue the arts, I was against the idea.
sentences.chinese: 当初先帝答应你去吴越之地学艺，我是反对的。

sentences.english: But, the development of one kind of literary art has its own latent principles.
sentences.chinese: 但一种文学艺术的发展，却有其自身发展的必然规律。

sentences.english: The view of figural virtue has great influence on Chinese ancient literature and art.
sentences.chinese: “比德”观对中国古代的文学艺术产生了重大的影响。

sentences.english: It is the product of teaching practice reform for normal school students to learn skills from master teachers.
sentences.chinese: 师范生拜师学艺是实践教学改革的产物。

sentences.english: The literary and art works that can last forever all give equal emphasis to emotion and meaning with each supporting the other.
sentences.chinese: 中外传世经典文学艺术作品都是情意互证两不偏废的。

sentences.english: Mr. . Wang: The chef trained in Florence. The pasta is very good here.
sentences.chinese: 大厨是在佛罗伦萨学艺，这里的意大利面很好吃。

sentences.english: In history teaching of middle school, literature and art also can have lasted their aesthetic education functions.
sentences.chinese: 在中学历史教学中文学艺术亦可发挥其美育功能。

sentences.english: One is away from home, to Chenjiagou study with a teacher.
sentences.chinese: 一个人离开了家，到陈家沟拜师学艺。

definition: to join a guru for instruction
to formally become an apprentice to a master
to finish apprenticeship/to graduate/to send out troops (under a commander)
used for 師傅|师傅 (in Taiwan)/master/qualified worker
to impart skills/to pass on one's art
handed down in a direct line from the founder
